quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.description: Einstein's perspective on the power of imagination in shaping the future.

quotes.quote: I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.description: Einstein's acknowledgment of the power of curiosity in intellectual pursuits.

quotes.quote: It is not that I'm so smart. But I stay with the questions much longer.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.description: Insight into the importance of staying curious and engaged with questions.

quotes.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.description: Insight into the profound understanding that nature can offer about life and existence.

quotes.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.description: Einstein's viewpoint on the role of imagination in measuring intelligence.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.description: A playful definition of the relationship between creativity and intelligence.
